name: PhazeDDL.com - Ultimate Style, Rainbow Table
description:
[ATTENTION!]

This Script requires the Firefox-Addon: "Greasemonkey" and the Userscript: "PhazeDDL - Rainbow Table" to work.

Download Greasemonkey: https://addons.mozilla.org/de/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/
Download PhazeDDL - Rainbow Table: http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/113965

For regrouping the table entries, use: PhazeDDL - Regroup Table
Download PhazeDDL - Regroup Table: http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/113966 (Optional)

Recommended usage with userstyle: style 45656 (Optional)

If you like this style, please support it by commenting, rating or sharing it.
